document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

Biology. Meadows, ruderal habitats. Adults occur in IV–VII. Oligophagous on Fabaceae (
Vicia
,
Lathyrus
) ( Scherf 1964 ; Tempère & Péricart 1989 )
